The 4th Love Revolution () is a South Korean television series starring Kim Yo-han and Hwang Bo-reum-byeol. The series depicts Kang Min-hak, a famous model and influencer, and Joo Yeon-san, a brilliant computer engineering student who's clueless about romance, as they navigate love's ups and downs. It premiered on Wavve on November 13, 2025, and airs every Thursday, with 4 episodes released, for a total of 16 episodes, at 11:00 (KST).
Cast and characters
Main
* Kim Yo-han as Kang Min-hak
* Hwang Bo-reum-byeol as Ju Yeon-san
Supporting
* Kwon Young-eun as Yang Na-rae
* Minseo as Kang Dong-won
* Heo Jeong-do as Kim Mo-hyan
* Im Sung-kyun as Ban Ji-no
*  as Im Yu-ri
* Lee Jun-hyuk as Peng Gil-tan
* Woo Ji-hyun as Kang Jae-hak
* Lee Ji-hye as Uhm Nan-sae
Production and release
The 4th Love Revolution is co-directed by Yoon Sung-ho and Han In-mi, written by Creative Group Songpyeon (Song Hyun-joo and  Kim Hong-ki), and produced by Story Mob, Studio CR, and Binge Works with co-production and investment from Pony Canyon.
In December 2024, Kim Yo-han was reportedly cast to play Kang Min-hak.
On March 6, 2025, Kim Yo-han and Hwang Bo-reum-byeol were officially confirmed to star as announced by the production team.
On September 11, the script reading was revealed, and it was announced that the series is scheduled to premiere on Wavve in the second half of the year. On October 24, the series was confirmed to premiere on Wavve on November 13, at 11:00 (KST).
